seed_pair.target: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
seed_pair.known: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

S0001: I want to speak Spanish with you now.
S0003: cómo hablar lo más frecuentamente posible
how to speak as often as possible
S0004: how to say something in Spanish
S0005: Voy a practicar hablar con alguien más.
I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
S0006: I'm trying to remember a word.
S0007: Quiero intentar tan duro como pueda hoy.
I want to try as hard as I can today.
S0008: Voy a intentar explicar lo que quiero decir.
I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
S0009: Hablo un poco de español ahora.
I speak a little Spanish now.
S0010: No estoy seguro si puedo recordar toda la oración.
I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
